A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It took me time to understand this movie after watching it. Reading many review from critics and users and for me I finally truly understand. Star Wars TLJ is not a Star Wars movie!!! Everything the TFA sets up to move the new trilogy ends with nothing. TLJ is a rewrite of TFA!!!
